body:
So recently there has been a lot of discussion regarding why certain personal topics are not allowed, and some are.
Several members of the community clearly want some input as to how this rule should be enforced, so please discuss here.

If you believe topics that may include:

  • Demotions
  • Leaving Posts
  • Personal Issues
  • Personal Achievements
  • Name Changes ("What should I change my name to?")
  • ETC...
should or should not be allowed, please state your opinion below, as well as a reasoning as to why they should or should not be allowed.

Please discuss this below, and the staff team will consider your perspectives on this issue.

Regards,
-Porky.

replies.body:
From your list:

  • Demotions: Only of the person demoted wants to talk about it because I believe that they deserve that much.
  • Leaving Posts: If it is permanent.  This doesn't mean a month and they return.   
  • Personal Issues: I feel like this should be allowed because this is a community that helps others.  Now if they post a thread about something like this; My computer broke.  Or I broke my arm, not allowed.  But if its something like this; My parents are divorced or something to that extreme, then it should be allowed.
  • Personal Achievements: No
  • Name Changes ("What should I change my name to?"): No
